summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Community Development Block Grant Program for the grant program year, Jan 1, 1989 to Dec. 31, 1989 amending Ordinance 114283 to add a new Sect. 3, creating interim use projects by the Dept. of Community Development through the making of loans and authorizing the Dept. of Community Development to enter into agreements necessary to effect the project, land appropriating funds from the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund.
